item.title: Amazing Japanese Meal at Kazuko Ramenba, Makati City, Manila, Philippines
item.description: It was my second week in Manila, near the end of my trip. A normal weeknight, but the streets of Makati were still alive with neon lights, music spilling out of bars, and the warm, humid air that wraps around you at night in the Philippines. Around 2 a.m., after a couple of hours of bar-hopping, I found myself wandering—hungry, curious, and not ready to call it a night—when I spotted Kazuko Ramenba glowing invitingly on the corner.
